data.title: Monta Ellis Net Worth
data.meta_description: Quick and high-scoring NBA shooting guard who played for the Golden State Warriors from 2005 to 2012. He spent a few seasons each with the Milwaukee Bucks and Dallas Mavericks before signing with the Indiana Pacers in 2015.
data.text:
Monta Ellis is a professional basketball player who was born on October 26, 1985 in Jackson, MS. He is a quick and high-scoring shooting guard who has played for the Golden State Warriors, Milwaukee Bucks, Dallas Mavericks, and Indiana Pacers. Ellis has been in the NBA since 2005 and is currently playing for the Pacers.

Monta Ellis is a member of Basketball Player

Age, Biography and Wiki

ð° Net worth: $21 Million

About

Quick and high-scoring NBA shooting guard who played for the Golden State Warriors from 2005 to 2012. He spent a few seasons each with the Milwaukee Bucks and Dallas Mavericks before signing with the Indiana Pacers in 2015.

Before Fame

While playing for Lanier High School in Jackson, Mississippi, he scored 42 points in a game against Oak Hill, who had both Rajon Rondo and Josh Smith.

Trivia

He was named the NBA's Most Improved Player in 2007.

Family Life

He married Juanika Amos in July of 2010 and he has two children.

Associated With

He played alongside star forward Dirk Nowitzki on the Mavericks from 2013 to 2015.
